name: Fruits Burst Mania
description:
Move the vivid fruits to match the same color, swap and group fruits with your finger to create a furious blast. Collect water drops and clovers in order to come through tricky levels. Travel across the paradise island and explore wondrous levels filled with fresh fruits.

Game Features:
* Enjoy hundreds of colorful puzzle levels in this fun match 3 game
* Try to clear obstacles like frozen ice blocks and flowers as quick as you can
* Pop and burst fruits under the items you need to collect
* Match more than 4 fruits to eliminate a larger number of treats
* Gather rewards and make special fruit combinations to create a Fruits Burst
* Boost your matching skills with awesome power-ups. 
* Free to play on different devices, no wifi needed

Play the new spin with Fruits Burst Mania and burst your way for FREE now!!!
